messages.messageBody:
July 2010
Hello!
My name is Kathleen Acker and I teach college mathematics. Most recently I have worked at American University. I am very interested in how people learn and teach mathematics. My colleagues and I are working on a research project that investigates how home school providers teach mathematics to their children. We are also interested in learning how home school students went about learning mathematics. We would like to invite you to participate in the study. If you are interested, please click on the following link and it will take you to an online survey at surveymonkey.com.
If you are a home school provider please click this link to participate:
https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/6SBJRWQ

If you are a home school student please click this link to participate:
https://www.surveymonkey.com/s/6SWSD28

All data is ANONYMOUS unless you choose to include your contact information.
Please do feel free to contact us if you have any questions or concerns. Our contact information is listed below.
Thank you in advance for your consideration.
Sincerely,
Kathleen Acker


Kathleen Acker
Kathleen.Ackerphd@...
Department of Mathematics and Statistics
American University
4400 Massachusetts Avenue, NW
Washington, DC 20016
